original_title: Naji Al-Ali, An Artist With Vision
overview: In july 1987 palestinian cartoonist Naji Al Ali was shot by unknown assassin. this documentary traces his life and work from his birth in Galilee to his death in London it examines the forces that shaped Naj Al Alii as an artist and as a human being and shows how his experiences mirror of other exiled palestinians.
title: Naji Al-Ali, An Artist With Vision
